title: Personal Portfolio Website
details: Built a responsive personal portfolio website using React and Tailwind CSS with a clean, minimal UI design.
Implemented an interactive project showcase with expandable details and category filtering for better navigation.
Integrated EmailJS to enable direct email submissions through the contact form.
Used OpenAI API to generate dynamic text content and enhance user engagement.
Implemented routing with React Router and smooth text animations via Typewriter-effect
Deployed the site with environment variable protection and modular component structure for easy scalability.

title: Discord Bot
details: Developed a modular Discord bot using discord.py, with music playback via yt-dlp and FFmpeg
Integrated OpenAI API for conversational features; structured commands under a custom cog-based architecture
Designed scalable and maintainable bot structure with custom decorators and dynamic command registration

title: Tour Recommendation System
details: Built a CLI geotagged photo analyzer converting .csv metadata into GPX format using pandas and gpxpy
Used spatial clustering with scikit-learn to identify tourism clusters; queried OSM data with osmnx to detect nearby amenities
Implemented personalized routing with networkx, generating optimal paths (walking, driving, straight-line) based on spatial graph traversal

title: Social Gaming Platform
details: Led a 7-person Agile team, overseeing sprint planning and conducting code reviews for backend architecture
Built a C++ multiplayer server with WebSocket++ for real-time synchronized play and spectator broadcasting
Validated server logic using GoogleTest, ensuring coverage of rule-based edge cases
Boosted scalability by 30% through modular CMake setup and custom test harnesses

title: Traffic Light System
details: Developed a Traffic Light System using C code on Debian.
Designed and programmed the traffic light control logic to manage traffic flow efficiently
Implemented a state machine to control the sequence of lights and timers based on traffic conditions
Utilized hardware components including a BeagleBone Green, ZenCape Red, and NeoPixel for system functionalities

title: Smart Door System
details: Developed RFID interaction logging and buzzer feedback system using C on BeagleBone Green
Built a Node.js web server to manage RFID access logs and permissions via a web interface
Integrated sensors (RFID, motion) and actuators (servo motor) to enable touchless smart door access

title: 2D Game (Java Program)
details: Directed an undermanned team and delegated tasks to team members using a Git Features Branch Workflow
Designed UML diagrams and use cases to improve workflow
Developed core systems in Java (Main character, Map, Tile system, Item system) using OOP
Built unit and structural tests with JUnit5 for both basic and edge cases

title: Mechatronic Design
details: Collaborated with mechanical, electrical, and software engineers to build robots capable of line tracking, barcode reading, and maze solving
Developed and tested functionalities using MATLAB and ROBOTC

title: Web-based First-Person Aim Practice Game
details: Built an aim testing game measuring reaction time and pointer accuracy using HTML and JavaScript
Focused on time management to meet course requirements within a short timeframe
